PassLib 1.1 documentation¶

Introduction¶

Welcome to the documentation for PassLib.

PassLib is a

A quick sample of some of the more frequently used modules:

  • bps.fs – object-oriented filesystem access
  • bps.host – desktop and host resources
  • bps.logs – enhancements to Python’s logging system
  • bps.text – text parsing and formatting
  • passlib.hash – password hashing algorithms

... see the library overview for a complete list.
